task.title: Forgot Your Password?
task.shortdesc: In the event that you have forgotten your password, you can easily reset it if you have access to the account email. To reset your password:

step.cmd: Click on “Forgot your password?’ below the account information text boxes
Enter your account email into the text box
An email will be sent to your account email with a link to reset your password
step.info: After the email is received, follow the instructions in the email. You will choose a new password, and then be able to log back into your account with the new password.
For more information contact customer support
